events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because the size I ordered does not fit me at all.
The customer's message mentions a refund request due to size issues, categorizing this case under Refund cluster.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to assist the customer with their refund request for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your jacket. I'd be happy to help you with the refund process.
Could you please confirm your order number and whether the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund.
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket has not been worn or washed; it's still in the original packaging.
Thank you for confirming the details. We have initiated the refund process, and you should receive the money back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions! I appreciate how smoothly the refund process is going.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. If you need any further assistance, please feel free to contact us.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
I received the refund today. Everything was handled very professionally. Thank you for your help!
Closing this case as the refund has been received and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about the refund experience. Your input helps us improve our service.
